traits.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The echo has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Wakeful
entries: When one of the echo's heads is asleep, its other head is awake.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The echo makes two Tentacle attacks.

actions.name: Tentacle
entries: Melee atk +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 13 (2d6 + 6 damage) bludgeoning damage plus 9 (2d8 damage) necrotic damage.
